resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105056</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105056</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212171</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Soils are the Pits!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Boden ist die Gruben!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les sols sont les puits !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os solos são os poços!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I terreni sono i pozzi!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα χώματα είναι τα κοιλώματα!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Los suelos son los huecos!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lab, students dig soil pits in order to observe, describe and interpret a soil profile. This Starting Point page lays out the exercise's learning goals, context for use, teaching notes and tips, teaching materials, assessment ideas, references and topics covered.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Labor graben Kursteilnehmer Bodengruben, um zu 
beobachten, beschreiben und deuten ein Bodenprofil. Diese 
Ausgangspunktseite breitet die erlernenziele der Übung, Kontext für 
Gebrauch-, die Unterrichtenumfaßten anmerkungen und Spitzen, 
Lehrmittel, Einschätzung Ideen aus, Referenzen und Themen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans ce laboratoire, les étudiants creusent des puits de 
sol afin d'observer, décrivent et interprètent un profil de sol. 
Cette page de point de départ présente les buts d'étude de 
l'exercice, contexte pour les extrémités d'utilisation, 
d'enseignement les notes et, le matériel didactique, les idées 
d'évaluation, les références et les sujets couverts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste laboratório, os estudantes escavam poços do solo a
fim observar, descrevem e interpretam um perfil do solo. Esta 
página do ponto começar coloca para fora dos objetivos de 
aprendizagem do exercício, contexto para as pontas do uso, ensinar as
notas e, os materiais de ensino, as idéias da avaliação, as 
referências e os tópicos cobertos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo laboratorio, gli allievi scavano i pozzi del 
terreno per osservare, descrivono ed interpretano un profilo del 
terreno. Questa pagina del punto di partenza presenta gli 
obiettivi imparanti dell'esercitazione, contesto per le punte di 
istruzione, di uso note e, i materiali didattici, le idee di 
valutazione, i riferimenti ed i soggetti coperti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το εργαστήριο, οι σπουδαστές σκάβουν τα 
εδαφολογικά κοιλώματα προκειμένου να παρατηρηθεί, να περιγραφεί 
και να ερμηνευθεί μια εδαφοτομή. Αυτή η σελίδα αφετηρίας 
σχεδιάζει τους στόχους εκμάθησης της άσκησης, πλαίσιο για τη 
χρήση, τις σημειώσεις και τις άκρες διδασκαλίας, τα εκπαιδευτικά 
υλικά, τις ιδέες αξιολόγησης, τις αναφορές και τα θέματα που 
καλύπτονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este laboratorio, los estudiantes cavan huecos del 
suelo para observar, describen e interpretan un perfil del suelo. 
Esta paginación del punto de partida presenta a las metas que 
aprenden del ejercicio, contexto para las extremidades del uso, de la 
enseñanza las notas y, los materiales didácticos, las ideas del 
gravamen, las referencias y los asuntos cubiertos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MARY SAVINA
FN:MARY SAVINA
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212171</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105056</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/soils-are-the-pits</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
